column4: ive got a weird problem in dapper i also had in breezy - when i boot from cold (power off) resolution is 640x480 and i cant change it, after a reboot its fine normal 1024x768 , this only seems to happen if im not connected to my dsl modem , has any one else had this problem?
: dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg, just change available resolutions
i don't know how to use it
all resolutions reappear ater reboot, it just happens 1st time i boot pc from power of
